trans-unit.source: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et gjenbrukbart objekt som sender utdata til en skriver når du skriver ut fra en Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create an instance of the PrintDocument class, set properties such as the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du opprette en forekomst av klassen PrintDocument, kan du angi egenskaper som den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, og kall av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>metode for å starte utskrift.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event where you specify the output to print, by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Behandle <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen der du angir utdataene skrive ut, ved hjelp av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>egenskapen for <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om å skrive ut fra en Windows-skjema-programmet, kan du se den [Windows Forms-Skriv ut støtte](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å skrive ut fra en Windows presentasjon Foundation-programmet, kan du se den <xref:System.Printing>navneområde.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer alle felt basert på standardskriver.

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis når du har opprettet en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, du har angitt skriver og siden Innstillinger som påvirker utdataene via den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>metoden og før den første siden i dokumentet skrives ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the BeginPrint event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis behandle BeginPrint-hendelsen for å starte skrifter, fil flyter og andre ressurser som brukes under utskriften.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, legger du til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegere til hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser med representanter [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sideinnstillinger som brukes som standard for alle sider som skal skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several default page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi flere standard sideinnstillinger via egenskapen DefaultPageSettings.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies whether the page prints in color, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies the margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angir om siden skrives ut i for den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angir liggende eller stående retning og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angir margene på siden.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event and modify the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å angi innstillinger for side ved side, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>hendelsen og endre den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>argumentet som er inkludert i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>henholdsvis.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After printing has started, changes to page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property will not affect pages being printed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når utskriften er startet, påvirker ikke endringer i sideinnstillinger via egenskapen DefaultPageSettings sider som skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that specifies the default page settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> som angir siden standardinnstillingene for dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dokumentnavnet for å vise (for eksempel i en trykt status dialogboksen for eller skriver kø) mens du skriver ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentName property does not specify the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DocumentName angir ikke filen til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: I stedet du angir utdataene å skrive ut ved behandling av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel kan du se den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The document name to display while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentnavnet skal vises mens du skriver ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The default is "document".
trans-unit.target: Standarden er "dokumentere".

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den siste siden i dokumentet er ut.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the EndPrint event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis behandle EndPrint-hendelsen for å frigjøre skrifter, fil flyter og andre ressurser som brukes under utskriften som skrifter.

trans-unit.source: You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Du angir at det er ingen flere sider til å skrive ut ved å angi den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false` i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EndPrint event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen EndPrint oppstår også hvis utskrift avbrytes, eller det oppstår et unntak under utskriften.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, legger du til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegere til hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser med representanter [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: It is called after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Kalles etter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>metoden og før den første siden i dokumentet skrives ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnBeginPrint metoden gjør det avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnBeginPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Når en utledede klassen kaller metoden OnBeginPrint, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>hendelsen ved å bruke hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: It is called when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den siste siden i dokumentet er ut.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint metoden gjør det avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnEndPrint kalles også hvis utskrift avbrytes, eller det oppstår et unntak under utskriften.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnEndPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Når en utledede klassen kaller metoden OnEndPrint, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>hendelsen ved å bruke hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: It is called before a page prints.
trans-unit.target: Kalles før en side skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: The OnPrintPage method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPrintPage metoden gjør det avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnPrintPage method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Når en utledede klassen kaller metoden OnPrintPage, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen ved å bruke hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: It is called immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles like før hver <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryPageSettings method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnQueryPageSettings kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnQueryPageSettings method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Når en utledede klassen kaller metoden OnQueryPageSettings, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>hendelsen ved å bruke hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om posisjonen for en grafikkobjekt som er tilknyttet en side er plassert rett innenfor brukerangitte margene eller øverste venstre hjørne av området som kan.

trans-unit.source: Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin.
trans-unit.target: Beregner området kan skrive ut krever vet den fysiske størrelsen på arket, marger for siden og plasseringen av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt origo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `true`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object location takes into account the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value and the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Når OriginAtMargins er `true`, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>plasseringen objekt tar hensyn til den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi og området som kan.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Når OriginAtMargins er `false`, bare området som kan siden brukes til å fastslå plasseringen for den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt kommer fra, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdien ignoreres.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, if OriginAtMargins is `true`, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set for 1 inch on each side, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis OriginAtMargins er for eksempel `true`, og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er angitt til 1 tomme på hver side av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet som er inkludert i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>er plassert 1 tomme fra venstre og toppen av siden.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and OriginAtMargins is `false`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis området som kan er.25 tomme på hver side og OriginAtMargins `false`, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet er plassert.25 tomme fra venstre og toppen av siden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan skrives ut område på siden varierer fra skriver til skriver og kan ikke garanteres skal symmetrisk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis grafikk kommer fra starter på sidemargene; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis kommer grafikk øverste venstre hjørne på siden kan skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Starts the document's printing process.
trans-unit.target: Starter dokumentets utskrift prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event and by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Angi utdataene å skrive ut ved behandling av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen og ved å bruke som er <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>inkludert i <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify which printer should print the document.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi hvilken skriver må skrive ut dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Print method prints the document without using a print dialog.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Print skriver ut dokumentet uten å bruke en dialogboks for utskrift.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>Når du vil gi brukeren mulighet til å velge innstillinger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception that is not handled by the Print method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis et som ikke er behandlet av metoden Print unntak under utskrift, utskrift av dokumentet ble avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren navnet i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir trykt kontrolleren som leder utskrift.

trans-unit.source: A print controller guides the printing process in several ways.
trans-unit.target: En domenekontroller for utskrift viser utskrift prosessen på flere måter.

trans-unit.source: For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å skrive ut et dokument, må du konvertere den til en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>angir hvor man tegner bildet i et bilde for en forhåndsvisning eller på en skriver til å skrive ut dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval.
trans-unit.target: Skriv ut domenekontrolleren kan også angi om å skrive ut et dokument gang eller vente et angitt intervall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> som viser utskrift.

trans-unit.source: The default is a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriveren skriver ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several printer settings through the PrinterSettings property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi flere skriverinnstillinger gjennom PrinterSettings-egenskap.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the printer to use, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the range of pages you want to print.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi hvor mange kopier du vil skrive ut, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi skriver til bruk, og <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi sideområdet du vil Skriv ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that specifies where and how the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> som angir hvor og hvordan dokumentet skrives.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> with its properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> med egenskapene satt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når utdataene til å skrive ut for gjeldende side kreves.

trans-unit.source: To specify the output to print, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi utdataene til å skrive ut, bruker du <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å angi en tekstlinje som skal skrives tegne du tekst med den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å angi utdataene, kan du angi om det finnes flere sider til å skrive ut ved å angi den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print.
trans-unit.target: Standard `false`, noe som angir at det finnes ingen flere sider til å skrive ut.

trans-unit.source: Individual page settings can also be modified through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and the print job can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Individuelle sideinnstillinger kan også endres via den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>og utskriftsjobben kan avbrytes ved å angi den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event.
trans-unit.target: Du skriver ut alle sidene i et dokument med ulike innstillinger, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, legger du til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>delegere til hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser med representanter [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Skjer umiddelbart før hver <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å skrive ut alle sidene i et dokument med ulike sideinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Du har angitt sideinnstillinger ved å endre enkelte egenskaper for det <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eller ved å sette egenskapen til en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>påvirker bare gjeldende side, ikke dokumentets standard sideinnstillinger.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også avbryte utskriftsjobben ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true` for <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, legger du til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>delegere til hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser med representanter [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om Skriv ut dokumentet, i strengform.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: En streng.
